title: Ultra-Kolyvagin systems and non-ordinary Selmer groups
summary: We develop a machine for bounding Selmer groups of Galois representations via Euler systems in "non-ordinary" settings, using Pottharst's definition of Selmer groups via Robba-ring $(\varphi, Γ)$-modules. Our approach relies on Sweeting's interpretation of Kolyvagin derivative classes via non-principal ultrafilters. We apply these results to prove new cases of the cyclotomic Iwasawa main conjecture for non-ordinary Rankin--Selberg convolutions.

AI.tldr: 开发了一种在非普通设置下通过欧拉系统界定Selmer群的机器，使用Pottharst通过Robba环(φ,Γ)模定义Selmer群的方法，并应用Sweeting通过非主超滤子解释Kolyvagin导数类的结果，证明了非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的Iwasawa主猜想新情况。
AI.motivation: 在非普通设置下界定Selmer群，并证明非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的Iwasawa主猜想新情况。
AI.method: 使用Pottharst通过Robba环(φ,Γ)模定义Selmer群的方法，结合Sweeting通过非主超滤子解释Kolyvagin导数类的结果。
AI.result: 开发了在非普通设置下通过欧拉系统界定Selmer群的机器，并证明了非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的Iwasawa主猜想新情况。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功地在非普通设置下界定了Selmer群，并为非普通Rankin-Selberg卷积的Iwasawa主猜想提供了新的证明。

title: Magnetization plateau and anisotropic magnetoresistance in the frustrated Kondo-lattice compound Ce3ScBi5
summary: Kondo metals with geometric frustration offer fertile ground for exploring exotic states of matter with a field-induced fractional magnetization platform and nonsaturating magnetoresistance. Herein, a Ce3ScBi5 single crystal with anti-Hf5Sn3Cu hexagonal structure was successfully synthesized via the bismuth self-flux method, leading to the formation of cerium cations arranged in a frustrated structure within a distorted kagome lattice. Magnetic measurements exhibit two distinct antiferromagnetic transitions at 4.1 and 5.9 K. Specifically, the occurrence of multiple metamagnetic transitions between magnetization plateaus is evidenced upon applying magnetic fields perpendicular to the c axis. Transport measurements highlight remarkable Kondo-lattice characteristics and anisotropic magnetoresistance in Ce3ScBi5. The anomalous Hall contributions are observed at low temperatures under critical fields, suggesting Fermi surface reconstruction in a subset of the metamagnetic transitions. We have constructed a temperature-field phase diagram to provide comprehensive information on the complex magnetic structures arising from competitive interactions. Our work establishes Ce3ScBi5 and related materials as a unique platform for exploring low-dimensional quantum fluctuations in bulk crystals, and analyzes the critical role of geometric frustration in Kondo and Ruderman-Kittel-Kasuya-Yosida physical frameworks.

AI.tldr: 成功合成了具有反Hf5Sn3Cu六方结构的Ce3ScBi5单晶，该材料在扭曲的kagome晶格中表现出几何阻挫结构。研究发现存在4.1K和5.9K两个反铁磁转变，在垂直于c轴的磁场下观察到多个亚铁磁转变和磁化平台。该材料显示出显著的近藤晶格特性和各向异性磁阻，在临界场下观察到反常霍尔效应，表明费米面重构。
AI.motivation: 研究几何阻挫近藤金属中的奇异物态，特别是场诱导的分数量子磁化平台和非饱和磁阻现象，探索低维量子涨落在体晶体中的表现。
AI.method: 采用铋自熔剂法合成Ce3ScBi5单晶，通过磁性测量研究反铁磁转变和亚铁磁转变，通过输运测量分析近藤晶格特性和磁阻行为，构建温度-磁场相图。
AI.result: 发现两个反铁磁转变温度(4.1K和5.9K)，观察到多个亚铁磁转变和磁化平台，证实了显著的近藤晶格特性和各向异性磁阻，在临界场下检测到反常霍尔效应，表明费米面重构。
AI.conclusion: Ce3ScBi5及相关材料为研究体晶体中低维量子涨落提供了独特平台，几何阻挫在近藤和RKKY物理框架中发挥关键作用。

title: Continuous-time Constrained Funnel Synthesis for Incrementally Quadratic Nonlinear Systems
comment: Revised version will be submitted to IEEE TAC
summary: This paper presents a convex optimization-based framework for synthesizing time-varying controlled invariant funnels and associated feedback control around a given nominal trajectory for nonlinear systems subject to bounded disturbances. Nonlinearities are modeled using incremental quadratic constraints, including Lipschitz, L-smooth, and sector-bounded nonlinearities. Funnel invariance is ensured via a DLMI. Together with pointwise-in-time LMIs for state and input constraints, we formulate a continuous-time funnel synthesis problem. To solve it using numerical optimal control techniques, the DLMI is reformulated into a differential matrix equality (DME) and an LMI, where the DME acts as a funnel dynamics equation. We explore different formulations of these funnel dynamics. Continuous-time constraint satisfaction is addressed through two convex methods: one based on intermediate constraint-checking points, and another using a successive convexification method with subgradients to handle nondifferentiable maximum eigenvalue functions. Theoretical justification is provided for the existence of a measurable and integrable subgradient for the latter. The method is demonstrated on two numerical examples: the control of a unicycle and a 6-degree-of-freedom quadrotor for obstacle avoidance.

AI.tldr: 提出基于凸优化的时变控制不变漏斗合成框架，用于非线性系统在有界扰动下的轨迹跟踪控制，通过增量二次约束建模非线性，使用DLMI确保漏斗不变性，并开发两种凸方法处理连续时间约束。
AI.motivation: 为非线性系统在有界扰动下提供鲁棒控制，确保轨迹跟踪的安全性和约束满足，特别是在障碍物规避等安全关键应用中。
AI.method: 使用增量二次约束建模非线性，通过DLMI确保漏斗不变性，将DLMI重构为DME和LMI，开发基于中间约束检查点和次梯度连续凸化的两种凸方法处理约束。
AI.result: 方法在独轮车和6自由度四旋翼的障碍物规避控制中得到验证，展示了有效的鲁棒控制和约束满足能力。
AI.conclusion: 提出的凸优化框架能够有效合成时变控制不变漏斗，为非线性系统提供鲁棒轨迹跟踪控制，特别是在安全关键应用中具有实用价值。

title: Hope, Aspirations, and the Impact of LLMs on Female Programming Learners in Afghanistan
summary: Designing impactful educational technologies in contexts of socio-political instability requires a nuanced understanding of educational aspirations. Currently, scalable metrics for measuring aspirations are limited. This study adapts, translates, and evaluates Snyder's Hope Scale as a metric for measuring aspirations among 136 women learning programming online during a period of systemic educational restrictions in Afghanistan. The adapted scale demonstrated good reliability (Cronbach's α = 0.78) and participants rated it as understandable and relevant. While overall aspiration-related scores did not differ significantly by access to Large Language Models (LLMs), those with access reported marginally higher scores on the Avenues subscale (p = .056), suggesting broader perceived pathways to achieving educational aspirations. These findings support the use of the adapted scale as a metric for aspirations in contexts of socio-political instability. More broadly, the adapted scale can be used to evaluate the impact of aspiration-driven design of educational technologies.

AI.tldr: 本研究在阿富汗社会政治不稳定背景下，针对136名在线学习编程的女性，改编并验证了斯奈德的希望量表作为衡量教育抱负的工具。改编后的量表显示出良好的信度，并且发现使用大型语言模型(LLMs)的参与者在实现抱负途径方面得分略高。
AI.motivation: 在社会政治不稳定背景下设计有影响力的教育技术需要理解教育抱负，但目前缺乏可扩展的抱负测量指标。
AI.method: 研究在阿富汗系统性教育限制期间，对136名在线学习编程的女性进行斯奈德希望量表的改编、翻译和评估。
AI.result: 改编后的量表信度良好(Cronbach's α = 0.78)，参与者认为其易于理解和相关。虽然总体抱负相关得分在有无LLMs访问权限的群体间无显著差异，但有访问权限的参与者在途径子量表上得分略高(p = .056)。
AI.conclusion: 研究支持在社政不稳定背景下使用改编后的量表作为抱负测量指标，该量表可用于评估教育技术中抱负驱动设计的影响。

title: Recursive algorithms for computing Birkhoff interpolation polynomials
summary: As a generalization of Hermite interpolation problem, Birkhoff interpolation is an important subject in numerical approximation. This paper generalizes the existing Generalized Recursive Polynomial Interpolation Algorithm (GRPIA) that is used to compute the Hermite interpolation polynomial. Based on the theory of the Schur complement and the Sylvester identity, the proposed recursive algorithms are applicable to a broader class of Birkhoff interpolation problems, where each interpolation condition is given by the composition of an evaluation functional and a differential polynomial. The approach incorporates a judgment condition to ensure the problem's well-posedness and computes a lower-degree Newton-type interpolation basis (which is also a strongly proper interpolation basis) along with the corresponding interpolation polynomial. Compared with existing algorithms that rely on Gaussian elimination to compute the interpolation basis, our recursive approach significantly reduces the computational cost.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种递归算法，将现有的广义递归多项式插值算法(GRPIA)推广到更广泛的Birkhoff插值问题，通过Schur补和Sylvester恒等式理论，能够处理由评估泛函和微分多项式组合构成的插值条件。
AI.motivation: 作为Hermite插值问题的推广，Birkhoff插值是数值逼近中的重要课题。现有算法主要依赖高斯消元法计算插值基，计算成本较高，需要开发更高效的递归算法。
AI.method: 基于Schur补和Sylvester恒等式理论，提出了递归算法，包含判断条件确保问题的适定性，计算低次Newton型插值基（也是强真插值基）及相应的插值多项式。
AI.result: 与依赖高斯消元法计算插值基的现有算法相比，所提出的递归方法显著降低了计算成本。
AI.conclusion: 该递归算法适用于更广泛的Birkhoff插值问题类别，在保持计算精度的同时大幅提升了计算效率。

title: Second-order spatial analysis of shapes of tumor cell nuclei
summary: Intra-tumor heterogeneity driving disease progression is characterized by distinct growth and spatial proliferation patterns of cells and their nuclei within tumor and non-tumor tissues. A widely accepted hypothesis is that these spatial patterns are correlated with morphology of the cells and their nuclei. Nevertheless, tools to quantify the correlation, with uncertainty, are scarce, and the state-of-the-art is based on low-dimensional numerical summaries of the shapes that are inadequate to fully encode shape information. To this end, we propose a marked point process framework to assess spatial correlation among shapes of planar closed curves, which represent cell or nuclei outlines. With shapes of curves as marks, the framework is based on a mark-weighted $K$ function, a second-order spatial statistic that accounts for the marks' variation by using test functions that capture only the shapes of cells and their nuclei. We then develop local and global hypothesis tests for spatial dependence between the marks using the $K$ function. The framework is brought to bear on the cell nuclei extracted from histopathology images of breast cancer, where we uncover distinct correlation patterns that are consistent with clinical expectations.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一个标记点过程框架，用于量化细胞核形状之间的空间相关性，通过标记加权K函数来评估平面闭合曲线的空间关联模式。
AI.motivation: 肿瘤内异质性表现为细胞及其核的不同生长和空间增殖模式，这些空间模式被认为与细胞核形态相关，但现有工具难以准确量化这种相关性且缺乏不确定性评估。
AI.method: 使用标记点过程框架，将细胞核轮廓表示为平面闭合曲线，通过标记加权K函数这一二阶空间统计量来捕捉形状变化，并开发了局部和全局假设检验来评估标记间的空间依赖性。
AI.result: 将该框架应用于乳腺癌组织病理学图像中的细胞核分析，发现了与临床预期一致的独特相关性模式。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的框架能够有效量化细胞核形状的空间相关性，为理解肿瘤异质性提供了新的分析工具。

title: Acoustic pulse propagation in a non-ideal shallow-water model
summary: This study develops a theoretical framework for modeling acoustic pulse propagation in a non-ideal shallow-water waveguide. We derive an ε-pseudodifferential operator (ε-PDO) formulation from the general three-dimensional wave equation, that accounts for vertical stratification, bottom interaction, and slow horizontal inhomogeneity. Using the operator separation of variables method and the WKB-ansatz, we obtain single-mode equations describing the evolution of amplitude and phase along rays. The approach incorporates non-self-adjoint operators to model energy leakage through the bottom and introduces a Hamiltonian formalism for eikonal and transport equations, enabling the computation of amplitude, time, and phase fronts. Analytical and numerical examples are provided for different boundary conditions, including Neumann (ideal), self-adjoint, and partially reflecting interfaces. The results extend previous semiclassical and ray-based theories of wave propagation by including dissipative effects and improving the physical realism of shallow-water acoustic modeling.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一个理论框架，用于模拟非理想浅水波导中的声脉冲传播。通过从三维波动方程推导ε-伪微分算子公式，考虑垂直分层、底部相互作用和缓慢水平不均匀性，获得了描述沿射线振幅和相位演化的单模方程。
AI.motivation: 扩展之前的半经典和射线传播理论，通过包含耗散效应和提高浅水声学建模的物理真实性，解决非理想浅水波导中声脉冲传播的建模问题。
AI.method: 使用算子分离变量法和WKB近似，从三维波动方程推导ε-伪微分算子公式。引入非自伴算子模拟底部能量泄漏，并采用哈密顿形式主义处理程函和输运方程。
AI.result: 获得了不同边界条件（包括诺依曼、自伴和部分反射界面）下的解析和数值解，能够计算振幅、时间和相位波前。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功扩展了浅水声学传播理论，包含了耗散效应，提高了物理真实性，为浅水波导中的声脉冲传播提供了更准确的建模框架。

authors: Elisabete M. de Gouveia Dal Pino
title: Detection Prospects for AGNs with the Cherenkov Telescope Array
comment: 8 pages, 4 figures. Presented at the 39th International Cosmic Ray Conference (ICRC 2025), 2025
summary: The Cherenkov Telescope Array Observatory (CTAO) will enable detailed studies of Active Galactic Nuclei (AGN) in the very-high-energy (VHE) regime, as the next-generation ground-based gamma-ray observatory, designed to enhance sensitivity and energy coverage (20 GeV -- 300 TeV) over current Imaging Atmospheric Cherenkov Telescopes (IACTs). In the context of the CTAO Science Collaboration, within the AGN Population working group, we developed a variability-based strategy to improve predictions of AGNs detectable by CTAO, using Fermi-LAT data and normalized excess variance (NXS) as a tracer of flux variability. By extrapolating from 30-day to 3-day timescales, we expanded the sample of sources with short-timescale variability estimates from 87 to 407. This approach allows us to identify flaring and distant AGNs that are promising CTAO targets. The results are being used to support the CTAO extragalactic science program and will be included in an upcoming Consortium publication for the AGN Population collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本文开发了一种基于变异性分析的策略，利用Fermi-LAT数据和归一化超额方差来改进对CTAO可探测活动星系核的预测，将短时标变异性估计的源数量从87个扩展到407个。
AI.motivation: 作为下一代地面伽马射线天文台，CTAO将显著提升灵敏度和能量覆盖范围，需要改进对活动星系核（AGN）的探测预测方法，特别是识别有前景的耀变和遥远AGN目标。
AI.method: 使用Fermi-LAT数据和归一化超额方差（NXS）作为通量变异性的示踪器，通过从30天到时标外推到3天时标，扩展了具有短时标变异性估计的源样本。
AI.result: 成功将具有短时标变异性估计的源数量从87个扩展到407个，能够识别出有前景的CTAO目标，包括耀变和遥远的活动星系核。
AI.conclusion: 该方法支持CTAO河外科学计划，结果将被纳入即将发布的AGN Population合作联盟出版物中，为下一代伽马射线观测提供重要目标选择依据。

title: Sporadic points on $X_0(N)$
summary: We determine all integers $N$ for which the modular curve $X_0(N)$ admits a sporadic CM point (of any degree), as well as all $N$ for which $X_0(N)$ admits a sporadic point, whether CM or non-CM. In a sense, our results generalize the classification of isogenies of elliptic curves over $\Q$ due to Mazur and Kenku: their work determines the $X_0(N)$ with degree 1 sporadic points, whereas we classify all $X_0(N)$ that have a sporadic point of arbitrary degree.

AI.tldr: 本文确定了所有整数N，使得模曲线X₀(N)存在零星CM点（任意度数），以及所有存在零星点（无论是CM还是非CM）的X₀(N)。
AI.motivation: 推广Mazur和Kenku关于椭圆曲线同源分类的工作，他们的研究确定了具有1度零星点的X₀(N)，而本文分类所有具有任意度数零星点的X₀(N)。
AI.method: 通过确定所有整数N，分析模曲线X₀(N)上零星CM点和零星点的存在性。
AI.result: 确定了所有存在零星CM点和零星点的模曲线X₀(N)的完整分类。
AI.conclusion: 本文完成了对模曲线X₀(N)上零星点（包括CM和非CM）的完整分类，推广了之前仅针对1度零星点的结果。

title: Stability Frontiers and Mixed-dimensional physics in the Kagome Intermetallics Ln3ScBi5 (Ln = La-Nd, Sm)
summary: Low-dimensional physics provides profound insights into strongly correlated interactions, leading to enhanced quantum effects and the emergence of exotic quantum states. The Ln3ScBi5 family stands out as a chemically versatile kagome platform with mixed low-dimensional structural framework and tunable physical properties. Our research initiates with a comprehensive evaluation of the currently known Ln3ScBi5 (Ln = La-Nd, Sm) materials, providing a robust methodology for assessing their stability frontiers within this system. Focusing on Pr3ScBi5, we investigate the influence of the zigzag chains of quasi-one-dimensional (Q1D) motifs and the distorted kagome layers of quasi-two-dimensional (Q2D) networks in the mixed-dimensional structure on the intricate magnetic ground states and unique spin fluctuations. Our study reveals that the noncollinear antiferromagnetic (AFM) moments of Pr3+ ions are confined within the Q2D kagome planes, displaying minimal in-plane anisotropy. In contrast, a strong AFM coupling is observed within the Q1D zigzag chains, significantly constraining spin motion. Notably, the magnetic frustration is partially the consequence of coupling to conduction electrons via the Ruderman-Kittel-Kasuya Yosida (RKKY) interaction, highlighting a promising framework for future investigations into mixed-dimensional frustration in Ln3ScBi5 systems.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Ln3ScBi5家族材料，特别是Pr3ScBi5，探讨了其混合维度结构（准一维锯齿链和准二维扭曲kagome层）对复杂磁基态和自旋涨落的影响。研究发现Pr3+离子的非共线反铁磁矩被限制在Q2D kagome平面内，而Q1D锯齿链内存在强反铁磁耦合，磁挫败部分源于通过RKKY相互作用与传导电子的耦合。
AI.motivation: 低维物理为强关联相互作用提供了深刻见解，导致增强的量子效应和奇异量子态的出现。Ln3ScBi5家族作为化学上多功能的kagome平台，具有混合低维结构框架和可调物理性质，值得深入研究。
AI.method: 首先对已知的Ln3ScBi5材料进行全面评估，建立评估其稳定性边界的稳健方法。重点研究Pr3ScBi5，分析其混合维度结构中准一维锯齿链和准二维扭曲kagome层对磁基态和自旋涨落的影响。
AI.result: 发现Pr3+离子的非共线反铁磁矩被限制在Q2D kagome平面内，显示出最小的面内各向异性。相反，在Q1D锯齿链内观察到强反铁磁耦合，显著限制了自旋运动。磁挫败部分是通过RKKY相互作用与传导电子耦合的结果。
AI.conclusion: Ln3ScBi5系统为研究混合维度磁挫败提供了一个有前景的框架，揭示了低维结构中复杂的磁相互作用机制，为未来研究混合维度挫败系统奠定了基础。

title: A 5D concept for space-time optimal control problems with application to simplified Carreau flow
summary: This work presents a 5D concept to optimizing non-Newtonian fluid flows through a simplified Carreau flow model. We solve the optimization problem by approximating the solution of the KKT System with fully space-time finite element methods instead of the more traditional time-stepping technique combined with spatial finite element discretization. Therein, the finite element method is formulated in 3D in space, 1D in time, and 1D in the optimization loop, yielding a 5D overall framework.

AI.tldr: 提出5D框架优化非牛顿流体流动，使用全时空有限元方法求解KKT系统，替代传统时间步进方法
AI.motivation: 传统方法结合时间步进和空间有限元离散，本文旨在通过全时空有限元方法更高效地求解非牛顿流体流动优化问题
AI.method: 采用5D框架：3D空间+1D时间+1D优化循环，使用全时空有限元方法近似求解KKT系统
AI.result: 建立了基于Carreau简化流动模型的非牛顿流体流动优化方法
AI.conclusion: 全时空有限元方法为流体流动优化问题提供了新的求解途径

title: Enabling Frontier Lab Collaboration to Mitigate AI Safety Risks
summary: Frontier AI labs face intense commercial competitive pressure to develop increasingly powerful systems, raising the risk of a race to the bottom on safety. Voluntary coordination among labs - including by way of joint safety testing, information sharing, and resource pooling - could reduce catastrophic and existential risks. But the risk of antitrust scrutiny may deter such collaboration, even when it is demonstrably beneficial. This paper explores how U.S. antitrust policy can evolve to accommodate AI safety cooperation without abandoning core competition principles. After outlining the risks of unconstrained AI development and the benefits of lab-lab coordination, the paper analyses potential antitrust concerns, including output restrictions, market allocation, and information sharing. It then surveys a range of legislative and regulatory reforms that could provide legal clarity and safe harbours that will encourage responsible collaboration.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨美国反垄断政策如何演进以容纳AI安全合作，同时不放弃核心竞争原则，分析AI开发风险、实验室间协调的益处及潜在反垄断问题，并提出立法和监管改革建议。
AI.motivation: 前沿AI实验室面临激烈商业竞争压力开发更强大系统，增加了安全风险，自愿协调可能减少灾难性和生存风险，但反垄断审查风险可能阻碍此类合作。
AI.method: 分析无约束AI开发风险、实验室间协调益处，评估潜在反垄断问题（包括产出限制、市场分配和信息共享），调查立法和监管改革方案。
AI.result: 识别了AI安全合作中的反垄断障碍，提出了提供法律明确性和安全港的改革建议，以鼓励负责任的协作。
AI.conclusion: 美国反垄断政策需要演进以容纳AI安全合作，通过立法和监管改革提供法律明确性，平衡安全需求与竞争原则。

title: A lattice algorithm with multiple shifts for function approximation in Korobov spaces
summary: In this paper, we propose a novel algorithm for function approximation in a weighted Korobov space based on shifted rank-1 lattice rules. To mitigate aliasing errors inherent in lattice-based Fourier coefficient estimation, we employ $\mathcal{O}((\log N)^{d} )$ good shifts and recover each Fourier coefficient via a least-squares procedure. We show that the resulting approximation achieves the optimal convergence rate for the $L_{\infty}$-approximation error in the worst-case setting, namely $\mathcal{O}(N^{-α+1/2+\varepsilon})$ for arbitrarily small $\varepsilon>0$. Moreover, by incorporating random shifts, the algorithm attains the optimal rate for the $L_{2}$-approximation error in the randomized setting, which is $\mathcal{O}(N^{-α+\varepsilon})$. Numerical experiments are presented to support the theoretical results.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于移位秩-1格点规则的新算法，用于加权Korobov空间中的函数逼近。通过使用O((log N)^d)个良好移位和最小二乘过程来减轻格点方法中固有的混叠误差，在L∞和L2范数下分别达到了最优收敛率。
AI.motivation: 为了解决格点方法中傅里叶系数估计固有的混叠误差问题，开发一种能够达到最优收敛率的函数逼近算法。
AI.method: 使用移位秩-1格点规则，采用O((log N)^d)个良好移位，通过最小二乘过程恢复每个傅里叶系数。结合随机移位来改进L2逼近误差。
AI.result: 在最坏情况下实现了L∞逼近误差的最优收敛率O(N^{-α+1/2+ε})，在随机化设置下实现了L2逼近误差的最优收敛率O(N^{-α+ε})。数值实验验证了理论结果。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的算法在加权Korobov空间中实现了函数逼近的最优收敛率，有效解决了格点方法中的混叠误差问题，并通过数值实验证实了理论分析的正确性。

title: Scaling behavioral incentives for low-carbon mobility through digital platforms
summary: Meeting global carbon reduction targets requires large-scale behavioral shifts in everyday travel. Yet, real-world evidence on how to motivate such large-scale behavioral change remains scarce. We evaluate a carbon incentive program embedded in a MaaS platform in Beijing, China, using data from 3.9 million participants and 4.8 billion multimodal trips over 395 days. The program increased reported public transport and bike travel by 20.3% per month and reduced gasoline car use by 1.8% per day, yielding an annual carbon reduction of ~94,000 tons, or 5.7% of certified reductions in Beijing's carbon market. Although effects diminished over time, participants still made 12.8% more green trips per month after eight months, indicating persistence. These results provide the first large-scale empirical evidence of carbon incentives in MaaS and highlight their potential to inform targeted, city-specific interventions that can scale to support global low-carbon mobility transitions.

AI.tldr: 该研究评估了北京MaaS平台中的碳激励计划，通过3.9百万参与者和48亿次多模式出行数据发现，该计划每月增加公共交通和自行车出行20.3%，每日减少汽油车使用1.8%，年碳减排约94,000吨。
AI.motivation: 满足全球碳减排目标需要在日常出行中实现大规模行为转变，但关于如何激励这种大规模行为改变的现实证据仍然稀缺。
AI.method: 使用北京MaaS平台中的碳激励计划数据，分析3.9百万参与者和48亿次多模式出行在395天内的行为变化。
AI.result: 碳激励计划显著增加了绿色出行：公共交通和自行车出行每月增加20.3%，汽油车使用每日减少1.8%，年碳减排约94,000吨，相当于北京碳市场认证减排量的5.7%。尽管效果随时间减弱，但8个月后参与者每月仍多进行12.8%的绿色出行。
AI.conclusion: 这是首个关于MaaS中碳激励的大规模实证证据，突显了其潜力，可为针对性的城市特定干预措施提供信息，支持全球低碳出行转型。

title: A $k$-contact Geometrical Approach to Pseudo-Gauge Transformation
summary: We propose a starting point to the geometric description for the pseudo-gauge ambiguity in relativistic hydrodynamics, showing that it corresponds to the freedom to redefine the thermodynamic equilibrium state of the system. To do this, we develop for the first time a description of a relativistic hydrodynamic-like theory using $k$-contact geometry. In this approach, thermodynamic laws are encoded in a $k$-contact form, thermodynamical states are described via $k$-contact Legendrian submanifolds, and conservation laws emerge as a consequence of Hamilton-de Donder-Weyl (HdDW) equations. The inherent non-uniqueness of these solutions is identified as the source of the pseudo-gauge freedom. We explicitly demonstrate how this redefinition of equilibrium works in a model of a Bjorken-like expansion, where a pseudo-gauge transformation is shown to leave the physical dissipation invariant.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了相对论流体动力学中伪规范模糊性的几何描述起点，表明它对应于重新定义系统热力学平衡态的自由度。作者首次使用k-接触几何描述相对论流体动力学理论，将热力学定律编码为k-接触形式，热力学状态通过k-接触勒让德子流形描述，守恒定律作为Hamilton-de Donder-Weyl方程的结果出现。
AI.motivation: 为相对论流体动力学中的伪规范模糊性提供几何描述，揭示其与热力学平衡态重新定义自由度的对应关系。
AI.method: 使用k-接触几何框架，将热力学定律编码为k-接触形式，热力学状态描述为k-接触勒让德子流形，通过Hamilton-de Donder-Weyl方程推导守恒定律。
AI.result: 证明了伪规范自由度的来源是这些解的内在非唯一性，并在Bjorken类膨胀模型中明确展示了伪规范变换如何保持物理耗散不变。
AI.conclusion: 伪规范模糊性对应于重新定义热力学平衡态的自由度，k-接触几何为相对论流体动力学提供了新的数学框架，其中守恒定律自然出现且伪规范变换不影响物理耗散。

title: Modelling Millisecond Pulsar Populations in Globular Clusters with NBODY6++GPU
comment: 4 pages, 1 figure. Proceedings for IAU Symposium 398/MODEST-25
summary: Millisecond pulsars (MSPs) are neutron stars with spin periods as short as a few milliseconds, formed through mass accretion from companion stars. In the dense environments of globular clusters (GCs), MSPs are likely to originate through dynamically assembled interacting binaries. Over 300 MSPs have been detected in GCs to date, more than half of the known Galactic MSP population. In this work, we model MSP populations in intermediate-mass GCs using the direct $N$-body code \textsc{NBODY6++GPU}. We update the code by implementing pulsar spin-down due to magnetic braking and spin-up through accretion, and use this framework to model the pulsar population in the globular cluster M71 to investigate the pulsar population within and the associated gravitational wave transients.

AI.tldr: 该论文使用N体模拟代码NBODY6++GPU建模中等质量球状星团中的毫秒脉冲星种群，特别关注M71星团，通过实现脉冲星自转减慢和吸积自转加速机制来研究脉冲星种群及其相关的引力波瞬变事件。
AI.motivation: 球状星团是毫秒脉冲星的重要形成场所，超过一半的已知银河系毫秒脉冲星在球状星团中被发现。这些脉冲星可能通过动力学相互作用形成的双星系统产生，需要更精确的模型来理解它们的形成过程和引力波信号。
AI.method: 更新直接N体模拟代码NBODY6++GPU，实现脉冲星磁制动导致的自转减慢和吸积导致的自转加速机制，使用该框架建模M71球状星团中的脉冲星种群。
AI.result: 成功建立了包含脉冲星自转演化物理的数值模拟框架，能够研究球状星团环境中毫秒脉冲星的形成和演化过程。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解球状星团中毫秒脉冲星种群的形成机制和相关的引力波瞬变事件提供了新的数值模拟工具和理论框架。

title: Irreducibility of Newton strata in Picard modular surfaces and split local Galois representations
summary: We compute the monodromy group of the closure of the non-ordinary Newton stratum of the special fiber of the Picard modular surface at a split prime and prove the irreducibility of it. As an arithmetic application, we prove that for a Picard modular form, the existence of companion forms is equivalent to the splitting properties of the associated local Galois representation. This is an analogue of a theorem due to Breuil and Emerton on companion forms of modular forms.

AI.tldr: 本文计算了分裂素数下Picard模曲面特殊纤维的非寻常牛顿层的闭包的单值群，并证明了其不可约性。作为算术应用，证明了Picard模形式的伴随形式存在性等价于相关局部Galois表示的分裂性质，这是Breuil和Emerton关于模形式伴随形式定理的类比。
AI.motivation: 研究Picard模曲面的非寻常牛顿层结构，探索Picard模形式与局部Galois表示之间的深刻联系，扩展Breuil和Emerton关于模形式伴随形式的经典结果到更高维情形。
AI.method: 通过计算分裂素数下Picard模曲面特殊纤维的非寻常牛顿层闭包的单值群，分析其代数结构，并建立与局部Galois表示分裂性质的对应关系。
AI.result: 证明了非寻常牛顿层闭包的单值群不可约，并建立了Picard模形式伴随形式存在性与局部Galois表示分裂性质的等价关系。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Breuil和Emerton的伴随形式理论推广到Picard模形式情形，揭示了高维模形式与Galois表示之间的深刻算术联系。

title: Finite Volume Analysis of the Poisson Problem via a Reduced Discontinuous Galerkin Space
summary: In this paper, we propose and analyze a high-order finite volume method for the Poisson problem based on the reduced discontinuous Galerkin (RDG) space. The main idea is to employ the RDG space as the trial space and the piecewise constant space as the test space, thereby formulating the scheme in a Petrov-Galerkin framework. This approach inherits the local conservation property of finite volume methods while benefiting from the approximation capabilities of discontinuous Galerkin spaces with significantly fewer degrees of freedom. We establish a rigorous error analysis of the proposed scheme: in particular, we prove optimal-order convergence in the DG energy norm and suboptimal-order convergence in \(L^2\) norm. The theoretical analysis is supported by a set of one- and two-dimensional numerical experiments with Dirichlet and periodic boundary conditions, which confirm both the accuracy and efficiency of the method. The significance of this work lies in bridging finite volume and discontinuous Galerkin methodologies through the RDG space, thus enabling finite volume schemes with a mathematically rigorous convergence theory.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于简化间断Galerkin空间的高阶有限体积方法求解泊松问题，该方法在Petrov-Galerkin框架下将RDG空间作为试探空间，分段常数空间作为检验空间，兼具有限体积法的局部守恒性和间断Galerkin空间的高精度逼近能力。
AI.motivation: 旨在通过RDG空间桥接有限体积法和间断Galerkin方法，使有限体积方案具有严格的数学收敛理论，同时保持局部守恒性并减少自由度数量。
AI.method: 采用Petrov-Galerkin框架，使用简化间断Galerkin空间作为试探空间，分段常数空间作为检验空间，构建高阶有限体积格式。
AI.result: 理论分析证明了在DG能量范数下的最优阶收敛性和L²范数下的次优阶收敛性，一维和二维数值实验验证了方法的准确性和效率。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功地将有限体积法和间断Galerkin方法相结合，为有限体积方案提供了数学上严格的收敛理论，同时保持了计算效率。

title: The trade-off between model flexibility and accuracy of the Expected Threat model in football
summary: With an average football (soccer) match recording over 3,000 on-ball events, effective use of this event data is essential for practitioners at football clubs to obtain meaningful insights. Models can extract more information from this data, and explainable methods can make them more accessible to practitioners. The Expected Threat model has been praised for its explainability and offers an accessible option. However, selecting the grid size is a challenging key design choice that has to be made when applying the Expected Threat model. Using a finer grid leads to a more flexible model that can better distinguish between different situations, but the accuracy of the estimates deteriorates with a more flexible model. Consequently, practitioners face challenges in balancing the trade-off between model flexibility and model accuracy. In this study, the Expected Threat model is analyzed from a theoretical perspective and simulations are performed based on the Markov chain of the model to examine its behavior in practice. Our theoretical results establish an upper bound on the error of the Expected Threat model for different flexibilities. Based on the simulations, a more accurate characterization of the model's error is provided, improving over the theoretical bound. Finally, these insights are converted into a practical rule of thumb to help practitioners choose the right balance between the model flexibility and the desired accuracy of the Expected Threat model.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了足球比赛中Expected Threat模型在网格大小选择上的权衡问题，通过理论分析和模拟实验提供了误差上界和实用建议，帮助从业者在模型灵活性和准确性之间找到平衡。
AI.motivation: 足球比赛数据丰富但难以有效利用，Expected Threat模型因其可解释性而受到青睐，但网格大小的选择面临灵活性与准确性的权衡挑战，需要为从业者提供实用指导。
AI.method: 从理论角度分析Expected Threat模型，基于模型的马尔可夫链进行模拟实验，建立不同灵活性下的误差上界，并通过模拟提供更准确的误差特征描述。
AI.result: 理论结果建立了Expected Threat模型在不同灵活性下的误差上界，模拟实验提供了比理论界限更准确的模型误差特征，最终转化为实用的经验法则。
AI.conclusion: 研究为从业者选择Expected Threat模型的网格大小提供了理论依据和实用指导，帮助在模型灵活性和准确性之间做出明智的权衡决策。

title: Generalized classical and quantum Zernike Hamiltonians
comment: 7 pages. Based on the contribution presented at "The XIII International Symposium on Quantum Theory and Symmetries (QTS-13)", 28 July - 1 August, 2025, Yerevan State University, Yerevan, Armenia}
summary: A superintegrable generalization of the classical and quantum Zernike systems is reviewed. The corresponding Hamiltonians are endowed with higher-order integrals and can be interpreted as higher-order superintegrable perturbations of the 2D spherical (Higgs), hyperbolic, and Euclidean harmonic oscillators. As a new result, the complete polynomial Higgs-type symmetry algebra of the generalized classical system is presented. For the generalized quantum system, the symmetry algebra and the spectra are provided for a representative case.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了经典和量子Zernike系统的超可积推广，这些系统具有高阶积分，可作为2D球面、双曲和欧几里德谐振子的高阶超可积扰动。新成果包括给出了广义经典系统的完整多项式Higgs型对称代数，以及量子系统的对称代数和谱分析。
AI.motivation: 研究Zernike系统的超可积推广，旨在探索具有高阶积分的哈密顿系统，这些系统可作为各种几何背景下谐振子的扰动模型，从而扩展对可积系统的理解。
AI.method: 通过构造具有高阶积分的哈密顿量，将经典和量子Zernike系统推广为超可积系统，并分析其在球面、双曲和欧几里德几何中的行为。
AI.result: 成功构建了广义经典系统的完整多项式Higgs型对称代数，并为量子系统提供了对称代数和谱分析，展示了这些系统的超可积特性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了Zernike系统的理论框架，建立了高阶超可积扰动模型，为理解复杂可积系统提供了新的数学工具和物理见解。

title: Probing Intrinsic Ellipticity in Neutron Star Binaries
summary: We present a novel resonance mechanism that can naturally occur in neutron star binaries: a spin-orbit resonance. This resonance locks the binary into a unique state where the neutron star spin evolves alongside the orbit. The resonance requires a finite neutron star ellipticity $ε$ possibly sourced by strong internal magnetic fields in magnetars, which are motivated by population study of eccentric neutron star-black hole binary GW200105. We find that the locking probability is proportional to $\sqrtε$. We derive the phase correction in the gravitational waveform due to this resonance locking effect, and have conducted a search in all neutron star binaries up to the O4a gravitational-wave catalog, with no positive event found so far. Observations by next-generation detectors such as Einstein Telescope and Cosmic Explorer, or even the upcoming upgrade of Advanced LIGO, have the potential to detect such locking signals, enabling precise measurements of both neutron star's ellipticity and moment of inertia. Future searches should be performed to discover this resonance, or, if undetected, to place constraints on the magnetar fraction in neutron star binaries.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种在中子星双星系统中自然发生的新型共振机制——自旋轨道共振，该机制能将双星锁定在一种独特状态，使中子星自旋与轨道同步演化。
AI.motivation: 研究动机源于GW200105偏心中子星-黑洞双星系统的群体研究，表明磁星中强内部磁场可能导致中子星具有有限椭率，从而引发这种共振现象。
AI.method: 通过理论推导共振锁定概率与椭率的关系，计算引力波波形中的相位修正，并在O4a引力波目录中的所有中子星双星系统中进行搜索。
AI.result: 目前尚未发现任何正事件，但下一代探测器如爱因斯坦望远镜、宇宙探索者以及升级版Advanced LIGO有望探测到此类锁定信号。
AI.conclusion: 未来应继续搜索这种共振现象，若未探测到则可对中子星双星中的磁星比例施加约束，若探测到则能精确测量中子星的椭率和转动惯量。

title: Regularized Products over arithmetic Schemes
summary: In this paper, we study the closed points of arithmetic schemes. We accomplish this by showing that the product of the cardinals of residue fields of closed points in an arithmetic scheme can be regularized. This regularization yields a new arithmetic invariant attached to the scheme. We compute it explicitly in several cases and find that it is always a transcendental number. This result provides a proof that the set of closed points is infinite. Our main tool is a regularization technique, which generalizes the zeta-regularization method introduced by Muñoz and Pérez.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了算术概型的闭点，通过正则化闭点剩余域基数乘积得到新的算术不变量，发现它总是超越数，从而证明闭点集合是无限的。
AI.motivation: 研究算术概型的闭点性质，特别是闭点集合的无限性问题，通过建立新的算术不变量来理解算术概型的结构。
AI.method: 使用正则化技术，特别是推广了Muñoz和Pérez引入的zeta-正则化方法，对闭点剩余域基数的乘积进行正则化。
AI.result: 明确计算了多个情况下的正则化值，发现它总是超越数，这为闭点集合的无限性提供了证明。
AI.conclusion: 通过正则化闭点剩余域基数乘积得到的新算术不变量是超越数，这证明了算术概型中闭点集合是无限的，为算术几何提供了新的工具和见解。

title: Probing the Critical Behavior of a Sign-Problematic Model with Monte Carlo Simulations
summary: The sign-problematic generalized Baxter-Wu (GBW) model with asymmetric complex couplings is mapped onto a one-dimensional quantum model. Utilizing the model's exactly known critical properties, we study the relation between the conventional and the modified average signs and the phase transitions in the GBW model. We find that the average sign develops a negative peak near the critical point, but it is not a unique indicator of phase transition, as similar features can appear in non-critical regions. While the average modified sign provides a viable probe for the phase transition, the practical effectiveness of this method is limited by the exponential scaling of computational cost with the system's volume. We propose that the universal properties of the original model can be investigated through simulating the related reference model, based on the universality assumption. Using finite-size scaling analysis based on Monte Carlo simulations, we confirm the validity of this method, which thereby provides a novel framework for investigating phase transitions in systems plagued by the sign problem.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了广义Baxter-Wu模型中的符号问题，发现平均符号在临界点附近出现负峰，但并非相变的唯一指标。改进的平均符号可作为相变探针，但计算成本随系统体积指数增长。作者提出通过模拟相关参考模型来研究原始模型的普适性性质。
AI.motivation: 研究符号问题严重的广义Baxter-Wu模型，探索平均符号与相变之间的关系，并寻找有效方法来研究存在符号问题的系统中的相变。
AI.method: 将广义Baxter-Wu模型映射到一维量子模型，利用已知的临界性质，分析传统和改进的平均符号与相变的关系。通过蒙特卡洛模拟进行有限尺寸标度分析，验证通过模拟参考模型研究原始模型普适性性质的方法。
AI.result: 发现平均符号在临界点附近出现负峰，但类似特征也可出现在非临界区域。改进的平均符号可作为相变探针，但计算成本随系统体积指数增长。验证了通过模拟参考模型研究原始模型普适性性质的有效性。
AI.conclusion: 提出了一种研究存在符号问题系统中相变的新框架，通过模拟相关参考模型来研究原始模型的普适性性质，为符号问题严重的系统提供了新的研究途径。

title: New numerical solutions to Newton's problem of least resistance via a convex hull approach
summary: We present a numerical method for the solution of Newton's problem of least resistance in the class of convex functions using a convex hull approach. We observe that the numerically computed solutions possess some symmetry. Further, their extremal points lie on several curves. By exploiting this conjectured structure, we are able to compute highly accurate solutions to Newton's problem.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种数值方法，使用凸包方法求解牛顿最小阻力问题在凸函数类中的解。发现数值解具有对称性，极值点分布在几条曲线上，利用这种结构可以计算高精度解。
AI.motivation: 研究牛顿最小阻力问题在凸函数类中的数值解法，探索解的几何结构和对称性特征。
AI.method: 采用凸包方法求解牛顿最小阻力问题，通过分析数值解的对称性和极值点分布规律来改进计算方法。
AI.result: 数值计算显示解具有对称性，极值点分布在几条曲线上，基于这种结构特征能够获得高精度的数值解。
AI.conclusion: 通过利用解的对称性和几何结构特征，可以有效地计算牛顿最小阻力问题的高精度数值解。

title: The Journal of Prompt-Engineered Philosophy Or: How I Started to Track AI Assistance and Stopped Worrying About Slop
comment: 46 pages (30 Article + 16 Appendix); 2 figures This arXiv preprint presents the conceptual framework and AI usage methodology (in the Appendix). Complete supplementary materials have been prepared and will accompany journal submission. This version is shared for early community feedback on the proposed infrastructure design
summary: Academic publishing increasingly requires authors to disclose AI assistance, yet imposes reputational costs for doing so--especially when such assistance is substantial. This article analyzes that structural contradiction, showing how incentives discourage transparency in precisely the work where it matters most. Traditional venues cannot resolve this tension through policy tweaks alone, as the underlying prestige economy rewards opacity. To address this, the article proposes an alternative publishing infrastructure: a venue outside prestige systems that enforces mandatory disclosure, enables reproduction-based review, and supports ecological validity through detailed documentation. As a demonstration of this approach, the article itself is presented as an example of AI-assisted scholarship under reasonably detailed disclosure, with representative prompt logs and modification records included. Rather than taking a position for or against AI-assisted scholarship, the article outlines conditions under which such work can be evaluated on its own terms: through transparent documentation, verification-oriented review, and participation by methodologically committed scholars. While focused on AI, the framework speaks to broader questions about how academic systems handle methodological innovation.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了学术出版中AI辅助披露的结构性矛盾：要求披露但披露后声誉受损，导致透明度激励不足。作者提出建立脱离声望体系的替代出版基础设施，强制披露、支持可复现性评审和生态效度验证。
AI.motivation: 解决学术出版中AI辅助披露的结构性矛盾——机构要求披露但实际惩罚披露行为，特别是在AI辅助程度较高的情况下，这种矛盾阻碍了透明度。
AI.method: 提出替代出版基础设施方案：脱离传统声望体系、强制披露、可复现性评审、详细文档支持生态效度验证。以本文自身作为AI辅助学术的示范案例，包含详细的提示记录和修改记录。
AI.result: 构建了一个能够使AI辅助学术工作按其自身条件被评估的框架：通过透明文档、验证导向评审和方法论承诺学者的参与。
AI.conclusion: 该框架不仅适用于AI辅助学术，也涉及学术系统如何处理方法论创新的更广泛问题，为透明、可验证的学术实践提供了可行路径。

title: Optimal convergence rates of an adaptive finite element method for unbounded domains
summary: We consider linear reaction-diffusion equations posed on unbounded domains, and discretized by adaptive Lagrange finite elements. To obtain finite-dimensional spaces, it is necessary to introduce a truncation boundary, whereby only a bounded computational subdomain is meshed, leading to an approximation of the solution by zero in the remainder of the domain. We propose a residual-based error estimator that accounts for both the standard discretization error as well as the effect of the truncation boundary. This estimator is shown to be reliable and efficient under appropriate assumptions on the triangulation. Based on this estimator, we devise an adaptive algorithm that automatically refines the mesh and pushes the truncation boundary towards infinity. We prove that this algorithm converges and even achieves optimal rates in terms of the number of degrees of freedom. We finally provide numerical examples illustrating our key theoretical findings.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种用于无界域上线性反应-扩散方程的自适应拉格朗日有限元方法，通过残差误差估计器同时考虑离散化误差和截断边界效应，并开发了收敛且达到最优速率的自适应算法。
AI.motivation: 解决无界域上反应-扩散方程有限元离散化时，需要引入截断边界带来的近似误差问题，传统方法只考虑离散化误差而忽略了截断边界的影响。
AI.method: 提出基于残差的误差估计器，同时考虑标准离散化误差和截断边界效应；设计自适应算法，自动细化网格并将截断边界推向无穷远。
AI.result: 证明了误差估计器在适当三角剖分假设下的可靠性和有效性；自适应算法收敛且在自由度数量方面达到最优收敛速率。
AI.conclusion: 该方法能够有效处理无界域问题，通过同时考虑两种误差源的自适应策略实现了理论上的最优性能，数值实验验证了理论结果。

title: The Dawn of Gravitational Wave Astronomy at Light-year Wavelengths: Insights from Pulsar Timing Arrays
comment: Invited review for Springer Nature Astronomy Awardee Prize Collection. Matches version for publication
summary: Arrays of precisely-timed millisecond pulsars are used to search for gravitational waves with periods of months to decades. Gravitational waves affect the path of radio pulses propagating from a pulsar to Earth, causing the arrival times of those pulses to deviate from expectations based on the physical characteristics of the pulsar system. By correlating these timing residuals in a pulsar timing array (PTA), one can search for a statistically isotropic background of gravitational waves by revealing evidence for a distinctive pattern predicted by General Relativity, known as the Hellings \& Downs curve. On June 29 2023, five regional PTA collaborations announced the first evidence for GWs at light-year wavelengths, predicated on support for this correlation pattern with statistical significances ranging from $\sim\!2-4σ$. The amplitude and shape of the recovered GW spectrum has also allowed many investigations of the expected source characteristics, ranging from a cosmic population of supermassive binary black holes to numerous processes in the early Universe. In the future, we expect to resolve signals from individual binary systems of supermassive black holes, and probe fundamental assumptions about the background, including its polarization, anisotropy, Gaussianity, and stationarity, all of which will aid efforts to discriminate its origin. In tandem with new facilities like DSA-2000 and the SKA, fueling further observations by regional PTAs and the International Pulsar Timing Array, PTAs have extraordinary potential to be engines of nanohertz GW discovery.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了脉冲星计时阵列(PTA)在探测纳赫兹引力波方面的突破性进展，包括2023年6月29日首次发现的引力波证据，以及未来在分辨单个超大质量黑洞双星系统和探索引力波背景特性方面的潜力。
AI.motivation: 利用精确计时的毫秒脉冲星阵列来探测周期为数月到数十年的引力波，通过分析脉冲到达时间的偏差来寻找引力波背景信号。
AI.method: 使用脉冲星计时阵列(PTA)技术，通过关联多个脉冲星的计时残差，寻找符合广义相对论预测的Hellings & Downs相关模式的引力波信号。
AI.result: 2023年6月29日，五个区域PTA合作项目首次发现了光年波长引力波的证据，统计显著性达到2-4σ，并恢复了引力波谱的振幅和形状。
AI.conclusion: PTA技术具有巨大的纳赫兹引力波发现潜力，未来将能够分辨单个超大质量黑洞双星系统，并探索引力波背景的极化、各向异性、高斯性和平稳性等基本特性，帮助确定其起源。

title: Bounds for monochromatic solutions to $\{x+y,xy\}$
summary: Let $r$ be a sufficiently large positive integer, and let $N \ge \exp\exp(r^{50})$. Then any $r$-colouring of $[N]$ contains a monochromatic copy of $\{x+y,xy\}$ with $x > y > 2$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于足够大的正整数r和N≥exp(exp(r^50))，任何对区间[N]的r着色都包含一个单色的{x+y, xy}形式的集合，其中x>y>2。
AI.motivation: 研究组合数论中的拉姆齐理论问题，特别是关于加法和乘法运算组合的着色性质。
AI.method: 使用组合数学和数论方法，通过分析足够大的整数区间上的着色情况来证明存在性。
AI.result: 证明了对于足够大的r和N，任何r着色都必然包含一个单色的{x+y, xy}集合。
AI.conclusion: 该结果扩展了拉姆齐理论在加法和乘法组合结构中的应用，为相关领域提供了新的理论支撑。

title: AI-generated podcasts: Synthetic Intimacy and Cultural Translation in NotebookLM's Audio Overviews
comment: This project has received funding from the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement number 101142306. The project is also supported by the Center for Digital Narrative, which is funded by the Research Council of Norway through its Centres of Excellence scheme, project number 332643
summary: This paper analyses AI-generated podcasts produced by Google's NotebookLM, which generates audio podcasts with two chatty AI hosts discussing whichever documents a user uploads. While AI-generated podcasts have been discussed as tools, for instance in medical education, they have not yet been analysed as media. By uploading different types of text and analysing the generated outputs I show how the podcasts' structure is built around a fixed template. I also find that NotebookLM not only translates texts from other languages into a perky standardised Mid-Western American accent, it also translates cultural contexts to a white, educated, middle-class American default. This is a distinct development in how publics are shaped by media, marking a departure from the multiple public spheres that scholars have described in human podcasting from the early 2000s until today, where hosts spoke to specific communities and responded to listener comments, to an abstraction of the podcast genre.

AI.tldr: 分析Google NotebookLM生成的AI播客，发现其使用固定模板结构，并将不同语言和文化的文本标准化为美国中西部口音和白人中产阶级文化背景，改变了传统播客的多重公共领域特征。
AI.motivation: 研究AI生成的播客作为媒体形式，而非工具，分析其如何标准化文化表达并改变公共领域的形成方式。
AI.method: 通过上传不同类型文本到NotebookLM，分析生成的播客输出结构和内容特征。
AI.result: 发现播客采用固定模板结构，将不同语言和文化背景标准化为美国中西部口音和白人中产阶级文化默认设置。
AI.conclusion: AI播客标志着从传统播客的多重公共领域向抽象化播客类型的转变，改变了媒体塑造公众的方式。

title: Multiwavelength spectral and temporal analysis of VHE Blazar 1ES 1959+650: Tracing emission mechanisms across flux states
summary: The high-synchrotron-peaked BL Lac object 1ES\,1959+650 exhibited pronounced activity between MJD~60310 -- 60603, including a very high energy (VHE) detection reported by LHAASO. To investigate the underlying emission mechanisms, we performed a comprehensive temporal and spectral analysis using multiwavelength data from \textit{Swift}-XRT/UVOT and \textit{Fermi}-LAT, covering the optical/UV to GeV $γ$-ray bands. The source shows strong energy-dependent variability, with the largest fractional variability in $γ$-rays, followed by X-rays and UV/optical, consistent with leptonic emission scenarios. Based on the variability patterns, we identified distinct flux states (F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, VHE-FX1, and VHE-FX2). The X-ray spectra exhibit a clear ``harder-when-brighter'' trend across these states. We modeled the broadband spectral energy distributions (SEDs) using a one-zone model incorporating synchrotron and synchrotron self-Compton (SSC) emission, implemented in \textsc{xspec} using $χ^{2}$ minimization. During the VHE detection, the corresponding X-ray/optical emission likely resembled the F2 state. Modeling the VHE SED using F1-state data led to an SSC overprediction of the VHE flux, whereas all other states were well described within the one-zone framework. Systematic trends in physical parameters are observed across flux states, including spectral hardening, increasing break energy, rising bulk Lorentz factor, and decreasing magnetic field with increasing flux. These results suggest that enhanced particle acceleration efficiency and stronger Doppler boosting drive the observed flaring activity, while the decrease in magnetic field indicates conversion of magnetic energy into particle kinetic energy, consistent with shock-driven scenarios.

AI.tldr: 对高同步峰BL Lac天体1ES1959+650在活跃期的多波段观测分析，发现其表现出强烈的能量依赖性变化，并通过单区同步辐射和同步自康普顿模型成功拟合了宽带光谱能量分布。
AI.motivation: 研究1ES1959+650在活跃期的发射机制，特别是LHAASO报告的甚高能探测事件，以理解其多波段变化特性和物理过程。
AI.method: 使用Swift-XRT/UVOT和Fermi-LAT的多波段数据，进行时间和光谱分析，并采用单区同步辐射和同步自康普顿模型拟合宽带光谱能量分布。
AI.result: 识别出不同的通量状态，X射线光谱显示"越亮越硬"趋势，VHE探测期间X射线/光学发射类似F2状态，物理参数随通量增加呈现系统变化。
AI.conclusion: 增强的粒子加速效率和更强的多普勒推动驱动了观测到的耀发活动，磁场减小表明磁能转化为粒子动能，与冲击驱动情景一致。

title: Bilinear forms with trace functions
summary:
We obtain non-trivial bounds for bilinear sums of trace functions below the Pólya-Vinogradov range assuming only that the geometric monodromy group of the underlying ell-adic sheaf satisfies certain simple structural properties, in contrast to previous works which handled only special cases of Kloosterman and hypergeometric sheaves.
  Our approach builds on a general "soft" stratification theorem for sums of products of trace functions, based on an idea of Junyan Xu, combined with a new robust version of the Goursat-Kolchin-Ribet criterion.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了在Pólya-Vinogradov范围以下获得双线性迹函数和的新界限，仅需底层ℓ-adic层的几何单值群满足简单结构性质，而之前的工作只能处理Kloosterman和超几何层的特殊情况。
AI.motivation: 之前的研究只能处理特殊类型的迹函数和（如Kloosterman和超几何层），本文旨在开发一个更通用的框架，仅基于几何单值群的结构性质就能获得双线性和的非平凡界限。
AI.method: 基于Junyan Xu的思想，构建了一个通用的"软"分层定理来处理迹函数乘积和，并结合了Goursat-Kolchin-Ribet准则的新鲁棒版本。
AI.result: 获得了在Pólya-Vinogradov范围以下的双线性迹函数和的非平凡界限，突破了之前只能处理特殊情况的限制。
AI.conclusion: 该方法提供了一个更通用的框架来处理迹函数和，仅需几何单值群满足简单结构性质，扩展了此类问题的处理范围。

title: Robust Least-Squares Optimization for Data-Driven Predictive Control: A Geometric Approach
comment: Submitted to the 8th Annual Learning for Dynamics & Control Conference June 17-19 2026, USC, Los Angeles, USA
summary: The paper studies a geometrically robust least-squares problem that extends classical and norm-based robust formulations. Rather than minimizing residual error for fixed or perturbed data, we interpret least-squares as enforcing approximate subspace inclusion between measured and true data spaces. The uncertainty in this geometric relation is modeled as a metric ball on the Grassmannian manifold, leading to a min-max problem over Euclidean and manifold variables. The inner maximization admits a closed-form solution, enabling an efficient algorithm with a transparent geometric interpretation. Applied to robust finite-horizon linear-quadratic tracking in data-enabled predictive control, the method improves upon existing robust least-squares formulations, achieving stronger robustness and favorable scaling under small uncertainty.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了一种几何鲁棒最小二乘问题，扩展了经典和基于范数的鲁棒公式。该方法将最小二乘解释为在测量和真实数据空间之间强制执行近似子空间包含，并在Grassmann流形上建模几何关系的不确定性。
AI.motivation: 传统最小二乘方法对固定或扰动数据最小化残差误差，本文旨在开发更具几何鲁棒性的方法，通过子空间包含关系来处理数据不确定性。
AI.method: 将不确定性建模为Grassmann流形上的度量球，形成欧几里得和流形变量的min-max问题。内层最大化问题有闭式解，从而实现了具有透明几何解释的高效算法。
AI.result: 应用于数据驱动预测控制中的鲁棒有限时域线性二次跟踪问题，该方法改进了现有的鲁棒最小二乘公式，在小不确定性下实现了更强的鲁棒性和有利的缩放特性。
AI.conclusion: 所提出的几何鲁棒最小二乘方法在Grassmann流形框架下提供了有效的鲁棒性解决方案，在数据驱动控制应用中表现出优越性能。

title: Operationalizing Justice: Towards the Development of a Principle Based Design Framework for Human Services AI
summary: Scholars investigating ethical AI, especially in high stakes settings like child welfare, have arguably been seeking ways to embed notions of justice into the design of these critical technologies. These efforts often operationalize justice at the upper and lower bounds of its continuum, defining it in terms of progressiveness or reform. Before characterizing the type of justice an AI tool should have baked in, we argue for a systematic discovery of how justice is executed by the recipient system: a method the Value Sensitive Design (VSD) framework terms Value Source analysis. The present work asks: how is justice operationalized within current child welfare administrative policy and what does it teach us about how to develop AI? We conduct a mixed-methods analysis of child welfare policy in the state of New York and find a range of functional definitions of justice (which we term principles). These principles reflect more nuanced understandings of justice across a spectrum of contexts: from established concepts like fairness and equity to less common foci like the proprietary rights of parents and children. Our work contributes to a deeper understanding of the interplay between AI and policy, highlighting the importance of operationalized values in adjudicating our development of ethical design requirements for high stakes decision settings.

AI.tldr: 本文通过分析纽约州儿童福利政策，探讨了正义在AI系统设计中的操作化定义，强调在开发高风险决策AI工具前需要先理解接收系统的正义执行方式。
AI.motivation: 研究旨在将正义概念嵌入高风险AI系统设计，特别是在儿童福利领域，通过系统性地发现接收系统如何执行正义来指导AI开发。
AI.method: 采用混合方法分析纽约州儿童福利政策，识别政策中正义的功能性定义（称为原则）。
AI.result: 发现了一系列反映不同情境下正义理解的复杂原则，包括公平、公正等传统概念，以及父母和儿童专有权利等较少关注的焦点。
AI.conclusion: 研究深化了对AI与政策相互作用的理解，强调操作化价值观在制定高风险决策环境中伦理设计要求的重要性。

title: Dual Weighted Residual-driven adaptive mesh refinement to enhance biomechanical simulations
summary: This chapter describes how a posteriori error estimates targeting a user-defined quantity of interest, using the Dual Weighted Residual (DWR) technique, can be easily applied for biomechanical simulations in current engineering practice. The proposed method considers a very general setting that encompasses complex geometries, model non-linearities (hyperelasticity, fluid-structure interaction) and multi-goal oriented techniques. The developments are substantiated with some numerical tests.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了如何将针对用户定义感兴趣量的后验误差估计（使用双加权残差技术）轻松应用于当前工程实践中的生物力学模拟，涵盖复杂几何、模型非线性和多目标导向技术。
AI.motivation: 为生物力学模拟提供一种易于应用的后验误差估计方法，针对用户定义的感兴趣量进行精确误差控制，适应工程实践中的复杂需求。
AI.method: 采用双加权残差（DWR）技术，处理复杂几何、超弹性等非线性模型、流固耦合问题，并支持多目标导向技术。
AI.result: 通过数值测试验证了所提出方法的有效性，展示了在生物力学模拟中的实际应用能力。
AI.conclusion: DWR技术可以成功应用于生物力学模拟，为工程实践提供灵活且强大的后验误差估计工具，特别适用于处理复杂几何和非线性问题。

title: Not all roads lead to merger: AGN disc properties influence the interactions of highly unequal mass black holes
comment: Submitted to MNRAS, comments are welcome
summary: As the number of gravitational-wave detections of black hole binaries grows, so does the diversity of proposed formation channels. The growing sample of systems with highly unequal masses, such as GW190814 with $m_1=23.2\,M_{\odot}$ and $m_2=2.59\,M_{\odot}$ -- corresponding to a mass ratio $q=0.112$ -- cannot be readily explained by isolated binary evolution and may originate through dynamical assembly in an active galactic nucleus (AGN). We investigate AGN discs capable of producing GW190814-like mergers using \texttt{pAGN} to model self-consistent AGN torques, coupled with \texttt{TSUNAMI}, a regularised N-body code including post-Newtonian terms up to 3.5 order. Suites of N-body simulations reveal possible outcomes of binary capture and merger, mean-motion resonance interactions, and other novel dynamical pathways. We develop analytical models linking the branching ratios of captures and mergers to local disc properties, applicable to black hole populations across all mass ratios. Capture probability is primarily governed by $\mathscr{B}$, the ratio of libration time to resonance-width crossing, and is well-described by a log-Gaussian, $P(\rm{capture}|\mathscr{B}) = A \exp[-(\ln \mathscr{B}-μ)^2/2σ^2]$, with $A = 0.41^{+0.04}_{-0.04}$, $μ= 1.09^{+0.08}_{-0.07}$, $σ= 1.05^{+0.08}_{-0.07}$. This fit, while an upper limit, is useful for simplified population synthesis. Finally, we explore the mass ratio AGN luminosity parameter space and find that GW190814 may be formed in a low luminosity AGN of $L_{\rm AGN}\approx 10^{43.5}\ \rm erg\ s^{-1}$. A more systematic parameter space exploration and future population studies will further test our predictions.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在活动星系核(AGN)盘中形成类似GW190814这样质量比极不均衡的黑洞双星合并事件的机制，通过数值模拟和解析模型揭示了捕获概率与盘性质的关系。
AI.motivation: 随着引力波探测到的黑洞双星系统增多，特别是像GW190814这样质量比极不均衡的系统(q=0.112)，无法通过孤立双星演化解释，需要探索新的形成通道，如AGN盘中的动力学组装。
AI.method: 使用pAGN模型模拟自洽的AGN扭矩，结合包含3.5阶后牛顿项的TSUNAMI正则化N体代码，进行N体模拟研究双星捕获、合并、平均运动共振等动力学过程。
AI.result: 建立了捕获概率与盘性质的解析关系，发现捕获概率主要受ℬ参数(天平动时间与共振宽度穿越时间之比)控制，可用对数高斯分布描述。GW190814可能在低光度AGN(L≈10^43.5 erg/s)中形成。
AI.conclusion: AGN盘为解释质量比极不均衡的黑洞双星合并提供了可行的形成通道，建立的解析模型可用于简化种群合成研究，未来需要更系统的参数空间探索来验证预测。

title: From Everyday to Existential -- The ethics of shifting the boundaries of health and data with multimodal digital biomarkers
summary: Multimodal digital biomarkers (MDBs) integrate diverse physiological, behavioral, and contextual data to provide continuous representations of health. This paper argues that MDBs expand the concept of digital biomarkers along the dimensions of variability, complexity and abstraction, producing an ontological shift that datafies health and an epistemic shift that redefines health relevance. These transformations entail ethical implications for knowledge, responsibility, and governance in data-driven, preventive medicine.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了多模态数字生物标志物（MDBs）如何通过整合多种生理、行为和情境数据来扩展数字生物标志物的概念，并分析了其带来的本体论和认识论转变以及相关的伦理影响。
AI.motivation: 研究MDBs如何通过整合多样化数据来提供连续的健康表征，并探讨这种整合带来的概念扩展和转变。
AI.method: 通过分析MDBs在变异性、复杂性和抽象性三个维度上的扩展，探讨其产生的本体论转变（将健康数据化）和认识论转变（重新定义健康相关性）。
AI.result: MDBs在数字生物标志物概念上实现了重要扩展，产生了将健康数据化的本体论转变和重新定义健康相关性的认识论转变。
AI.conclusion: MDBs的转变在数据驱动的预防医学中带来了关于知识、责任和治理的重要伦理影响，需要相应的伦理框架来应对这些变化。

title: A coupled finite element-virtual element method for thermomechanical analysis of electronic packaging structures
summary: This study presents a finite element and virtual element (FE-VE) coupled method for thermomechanical analysis in electronic packaging structures. The approach partitions computational domains strategically, employing FEM for regular geometries to maximize computational efficiency and VEM for complex shapes to enhance geometric flexibility. Interface compatibility is maintained through coincident nodal correspondence, ensuring solution continuity across domain boundaries while reducing meshing complexity and computational overhead. Validation through electronic packaging applications demonstrates reasonable agreement with reference solutions and acceptable convergence characteristics across varying mesh densities. The method effectively captures thermal distributions and stress concentrations in multi-material systems, establishing a practical computational framework for electronic packaging analysis involving complex geometries. Source codes are available at https://github.com/yanpeng-gong/FeVeCoupled-ElectronicPackaging.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种有限元-虚拟元耦合方法，用于电子封装结构的热力学分析。该方法通过策略性划分计算域，在规则几何区域使用有限元法以提高计算效率，在复杂形状区域使用虚拟元法以增强几何灵活性。通过节点对应保持界面兼容性，确保跨域解连续性，同时减少网格生成复杂性和计算开销。
AI.motivation: 电子封装结构通常包含复杂的几何形状和多材料系统，传统有限元法在处理复杂几何时存在网格生成困难。开发一种能够结合有限元法计算效率和虚拟元法几何灵活性的耦合方法，以更有效地进行电子封装热力学分析。
AI.method: 采用有限元-虚拟元耦合方法，策略性划分计算域：规则几何区域使用有限元法，复杂形状区域使用虚拟元法。通过重合节点对应保持界面兼容性，确保解在域边界上的连续性。
AI.result: 在电子封装应用中验证显示，该方法与参考解具有合理一致性，在不同网格密度下表现出可接受的收敛特性。能够有效捕捉多材料系统中的热分布和应力集中。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为涉及复杂几何的电子封装分析建立了一个实用的计算框架，源代码已在GitHub上公开。

title: Bright Cosmic-Ray Source as a Solution to Auger-TA Tensions
summary: The ultra-high-energy cosmic ray (UHECR) spectra measured by the Pierre Auger Observatory (Auger) and the Telescope Array (TA) agree very well below $10^{19.5}$ eV but differ significantly at higher energies. We show that these differences can be explained by a single nearby source superimposed on a nearly isotropic background. Taking into account deflections in Galactic and extragalactic magnetic fields, such a source can account for the excess in the TA spectrum without producing excessive anisotropy. The required hard spectrum of the source and intermediate-mass composition are consistent with previous fits of the Auger-only spectrum and composition. This scenario offers several additional advantages: (i) the source produces a broad excess partially overlapping the TA hotspots, suggesting their possible explanation; (ii) without additional tuning, it reproduces the $\sim90^\circ$ shift in dipole direction observed between the Auger-only and combined Auger-TA analyses; and (iii) the best-fit position of the source lies near M82, the brightest nearby starburst galaxy, making it a plausible source of the UHECR.

AI.tldr: 本文提出单个邻近源叠加在近各向同性背景上可以解释Pierre Auger和Telescope Array观测到的超高能宇宙射线谱差异，该源位于M82附近，能解释TA热点、偶极方向变化等现象。
AI.motivation: 解释Pierre Auger和Telescope Array在10^19.5 eV以上能量观测到的宇宙射线谱差异，同时解释TA热点区域和偶极方向变化等观测现象。
AI.method: 通过考虑银河系和河外磁场中的偏转效应，建立单个邻近源叠加在近各向同性背景上的模型，分析该模型对观测数据的解释能力。
AI.result: 该模型能很好地解释TA谱的超出而不产生过度各向异性，源的最佳拟合位置靠近M82星系，硬谱和中质量成分与Auger观测一致，还能解释90°偶极方向变化。
AI.conclusion: 单个邻近源模型为超高能宇宙射线观测差异提供了统一解释，M82作为最亮的邻近星暴星系是该源的合理候选体。

title: Experiment design for continuous-time systems using generalized filtering
summary: The goal of experiment design is to select the inputs of a dynamical system in such a way that the resulting data contain sufficient information for data-driven modeling and control. This paper investigates the problem of experiment design for continuous-time systems under piecewise constant input signals. To obviate the need for measuring time derivatives of (data) trajectories, we introduce a generalized filtering framework. Our main result is to establish conditions on the input and the filter functions under which the filtered data are informative for system identification, i.e., they satisfy a certain rank condition. The proposed framework encompasses several filter functions that have already appeared in the literature. Building on the proposed filtering framework, we develop an experiment design procedure where the input signal is designed online during system operation. This method is shown to be sample efficient, in the sense that it deals with the least possible number of filtered data samples for system identification.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了连续时间系统在分段常数输入信号下的实验设计问题，提出了广义滤波框架以避免测量时间导数，建立了确保滤波数据满足系统辨识秩条件的输入和滤波器条件，并开发了在线实验设计方法。
AI.motivation: 实验设计的目标是选择动态系统的输入，使产生的数据包含足够的信息用于数据驱动建模和控制。本文旨在解决连续时间系统在分段常数输入信号下的实验设计问题，避免测量数据轨迹的时间导数。
AI.method: 引入广义滤波框架，建立输入和滤波器函数满足系统辨识秩条件的条件，开发在线实验设计程序，在系统运行期间在线设计输入信号。
AI.result: 提出的框架包含文献中已有的几种滤波器函数，在线实验设计方法被证明是样本高效的，处理系统辨识所需的最少滤波数据样本数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为连续时间系统的实验设计提供了有效的滤波框架和在线设计方法，能够避免测量时间导数并实现样本高效的系统辨识。

title: Slaying the Dragon: The Quest for Democracy in Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs)
summary: This chapter explores how Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), a novel institutional form based on blockchain technology, challenge traditional centralized governance structures. DAOs govern projects ranging from finance to science and digital communities. They aim to redistribute decision-making power through programmable, transparent, and participatory mechanisms. This chapter outlines both the opportunities DAOs present, such as incentive alignment, rapid coordination, and censorship resistance, and the challenges they face, including token concentration, low participation, and the risk of de facto centralization. It further discusses the emerging intersection of DAOs and artificial intelligence, highlighting the potential for increased automation alongside the dangers of diminished human oversight and algorithmic opacity. Ultimately, we discuss under what circumstances DAOs can fulfill their democratic promise or risk replicating the very power asymmetries they seek to overcome.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨了基于区块链技术的去中心化自治组织（DAOs）如何挑战传统中心化治理结构，分析了DAOs在金融、科学和数字社区等领域的应用，以及其面临的机遇与挑战。
AI.motivation: 研究DAOs作为新型制度形式如何通过可编程、透明和参与性机制重新分配决策权，并探讨其民主承诺的实现条件。
AI.method: 通过理论分析，概述DAOs的治理机制、机会与挑战，特别关注其与人工智能的交叉领域。
AI.result: 识别了DAOs带来的激励机制对齐、快速协调和抗审查等机会，同时也揭示了代币集中、参与度低和实际中心化风险等挑战。
AI.conclusion: DAOs有潜力实现民主治理，但也可能复制其试图克服的权力不对称，关键在于具体实施条件和环境。

title: A Semi-Convergent Stage-Wise Framework with Provable Global Convergence for Adaptive Total Variation Regularization
summary: Image restoration requires a careful balance between noise suppression and structure preservation. While first-order total variation (TV) regularization effectively preserves edges, it often introduces staircase artifacts, whereas higher-order TV removes such artifacts but oversmooths fine details. To reconcile these competing effects, we propose a semi-convergent stage-wise framework that sequentially integrates first- and higher-order TV regularizers within an iterative restoration process implemented via ADMM. Each stage exhibits semi-convergence behavior, i.e., the iterates initially approach the ground truth before being degraded by over-regularization. By monitoring this evolution, the algorithm adaptively selects the locally optimal iterate (e.g., with the highest PSNR) and propagates it as the initial point for the next stage. This select-and-propagate mechanism effectively transfers local semi-convergence into a globally convergent iterative process. We establish theoretical guarantees showing that the sequence of stage-wise iterates is bounded, the objective values decrease monotonically. Extensive numerical experiments on denoising and deblurring benchmarks confirm that the proposed method achieves superior quantitative and perceptual performance compared with conventional first-, higher-order, hybrid TV methods, and learning based methods, while maintaining theoretical interpretability and algorithmic simplicity.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种半收敛阶段式框架，通过顺序整合一阶和高阶TV正则化器，在ADMM迭代恢复过程中自适应选择局部最优解并传播到下一阶段，有效平衡噪声抑制和结构保持。
AI.motivation: 解决图像恢复中噪声抑制与结构保持的平衡问题：一阶TV能有效保留边缘但会产生阶梯伪影，高阶TV能消除伪影但会过度平滑细节。
AI.method: 采用半收敛阶段式框架，在ADMM迭代过程中顺序整合一阶和高阶TV正则化器，通过监测半收敛行为自适应选择局部最优解并传播到下一阶段。
AI.result: 理论证明阶段式迭代序列有界且目标函数值单调递减。在去噪和去模糊基准测试中，该方法在定量和感知性能上优于传统一阶、高阶、混合TV方法以及基于学习的方法。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功将局部半收敛转化为全局收敛迭代过程，在保持理论可解释性和算法简洁性的同时，实现了优越的恢复性能。

title: Adversarially and Distributionally Robust Virtual Energy Storage Systems via the Scenario Approach
summary: We propose an optimization model where a parking lot manager (PLM) can aggregate parked EV batteries to provide virtual energy storage services that are provably robust under uncertain EV departures and state-of-charge caps. Our formulation yields a data-driven convex optimization problem where a prosumer community agrees on a contract with the PLM for the provision of storage services over a finite horizon. Leveraging recent results in the scenario approach, we certify out-of-sample constraint safety. Furthermore, we enable a tunable profit-risk trade-off through scenario relaxation and extend our model to account for robustness to adversarial perturbations and distributional shifts over Wasserstein-based ambiguity sets. All the approaches are accompanied by tight finite-sample certificates. Numerical studies demonstrate the out-of-sample and out-of-distribution constraint satisfaction of our proposed model compared to the developed theoretical guarantees, showing their effectiveness and potential in robust and efficient virtual energy services.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种停车场管理者聚合电动汽车电池提供虚拟储能服务的优化模型，该模型在不确定的电动汽车离开时间和充电状态上限下具有可证明的鲁棒性。
AI.motivation: 为了解决电动汽车电池聚合提供虚拟储能服务时面临的不确定性挑战，包括电动汽车的随机离开时间和充电状态限制，需要开发能够保证约束安全性的鲁棒优化方法。
AI.method: 采用数据驱动的凸优化问题，利用场景方法的最新成果来认证样本外约束安全性，通过场景松弛实现可调利润-风险权衡，并扩展到对抗性扰动和基于Wasserstein模糊集的分布偏移鲁棒性。
AI.result: 数值研究表明，与开发的理论保证相比，所提模型在样本外和分布外情况下都能满足约束条件，显示了其在鲁棒高效虚拟能源服务中的有效性和潜力。
AI.conclusion: 该模型为停车场管理者提供了一种可靠的方法来聚合电动汽车电池提供虚拟储能服务，具有严格的有限样本证书保证，能够在不确定性环境下实现鲁棒和高效的能源服务。

title: Numerical analysis and efficient implementation of fast collocation methods for fractional Laplacian model on nonuniform grids
summary: We propose a fast collocation method based on Krylov subspace iterative solver on general nonuniform grids for the fractional Laplacian problem, in which the fractional operator is presented in a singular integral formulation. The method is proved to be uniquely solvable on general nonuniform grids for $α\in(0,1)$, provided that the sum-of-exponentials (SOE) approximation is sufficiently accurate. In addition, a modified scheme is developed and proved to be uniquely solvable on uniform grids for $α\in(0,2)$. Efficient implementation of the proposed fast collocation schemes based on fast matrix-vector multiplication is carefully discussed, in terms of computational complexity and memory requirement. To further improve computational efficiency, a banded preconditioner is incorporated into the Krylov subspace iterative solver. A rigorous maximum-norm error analysis for $α\in(0,1)$ is presented on specific graded grids, which shows that the convergence order depends on the grading parameter. Numerical experiments validate the predicted convergence and demonstrate the efficiency of the fast collocation schemes.

title: Ultra extreme high-frequency-peaked BL Lacs: a potential population of MeV synchrotron blazars?
summary: We investigate the potential existence of a new population of BL Lacs, called ultra extreme high-energy-peaked BL Lacs (UEHBLs), whose synchrotron emission component peaks in the MeV band, extending the blazar sequence beyond its current limit. To model the spectral energy distribution of these new sources, we apply the hybrid shock-turbulence acceleration framework previously developed for extreme high-frequency-peaked BL Lacs. We present three representative realizations that produce synchrotron peaks between $0.2$ and $2$ MeV and evaluate their multiwavelenght signatures. Our results show that UEHBLs would be undetectable with current GeV (Fermi) and future TeV (CTA) facilities due to severe Klein-Nishina suppression of inverse Compton scattering, but are ideal targets for proposed MeV missions such as COSI, AMEGO-X, and e-ASTROGAM. We further identify a sample of hard X-ray sources from the Swift-BAT catalogs that exhibit the expected spectral properties of UEHBLs, potentially representing the first observational hints of this population. If confirmed, UEHBLs would provide unique insight into particle acceleration in relativistic jets, imposing strong constraints on the maximum achievable electron energies. We also discuss the expected polarization and variability signatures, including the possibility of synchrotron-driven thermal instabilities leading to MeV flares. These findings underscore the critical importance of the MeV band for discovering and characterizing the most extreme accelerators among blazars.

title: The fastest way through a traffic light
summary: We give a rigorous solution of an optimisation problem of minimizing the expected delay caused by encountering a red traffic light on a road journey. The problem incorporates simple constraints on maximum speed, acceleration and braking rates, and depends on the assumed distribution of the remaining time until the traffic light will turn green, after it is first noticed. We assume that this distribution has a bounded and non-increasing density, which is natural since this holds for the law of the excess time in any stationary renewal process. In two special cases, where this distribution is either Uniform or Exponential, we give a complete characterisation of all possible combinations of phases of maximum acceleration, maximum speed, maximum braking, following an Euler--Lagrange curve, and standing stationary at the traffic light, which can make up an optimal solution. The key technique is to write the problem in terms of a two-dimensional pressure integral, so that the problem becomes analogous to filling a tank with a given quantity of liquid.

title: Efficient Numerical Evaluation of Triple Integral Using the Euler's Method and Richardson's Extrapolation
summary: In this study, we employ Euler's method and Richardson's extrapolation to solve a triple integral, which is then transformed into a third-order initial value problem. Our objective is to resolve the computational challenges associated with triple integration by transforming it into an initial value problem. Euler's method is the fundamental numerical technique for approximating the solution, thereby establishing a baseline for accuracy. The precision of our computations is subsequently improved by employing Richardson's extrapolation to reduce errors systematically. This approach not only illustrates the adaptability of numerical methods in solving intricate mathematical problems, but it also emphasizes the significance of strategic error reduction techniques in enhancing computational outcomes. We present the efficacy of this method in solving triple integrals in an efficient manner through experimentation and analysis, thereby making a significant contribution to the fields of numerical computation and mathematical modeling.
